snippet: The White House is filing a legal brief to the Supreme Court, urging the justices to overturn California’s ban on gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: The White House is filing a legal brief to the Supreme Court, urging the justices to overturn California’s ban on gay marriage.

headline.main: Justice Department’s Amicus Brief in Gay Marriage Case
